leads.lead_text: Lamina narrowly elliptic to narrowly ovate; base attenuate; apex acuminate; inner perianth lobes acute
Lamina ovate to oblong-elliptic or narrowly oblong-elliptic; base rounded to cordate; apex obtuse to acute; inner perianth lobes rounded-truncate
